tr: Ölümü, onların hayatlarında bir boşluk bıraktı.

en: His death is a great loss.
We cannot grieve over his death too deeply.
tr: Ölümü için çok derin yas tutamayız.

en: News of his death wasn't published for several weeks.
tr: Ölüm haberi birkaç hafta boyunca yayınlanmadı.

en: His death was broadcast all over the world.
His death was a sublime self-sacrifice.
Your assumption that his death was an accident seems to be wrong.
tr: Ölümünün bir kaza olduğu varsayımın yanlış gibi görünüyor.

en: His death surprised us all.
His death was a bolt from the blue.
His death was great shock to his wife.
